controller

Class ManagerScreeningsViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ManagerScreeningsViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ManagerScreeningsViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Purpose: This class provides a detail for for a single screening the employee selects on the previous page (employee root view).The employee (manager) can view explicit booked and available seats, graphical summary of it and can download all screening data as csv text file.
    Author:
    Lorenz

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManagerScreeningsViewController()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildSeat(int screeningID, java.lang.String seatID, javafx.scene.image.ImageView seatFree, int col, int row)
      Purpose: Builds the full functionality of each seat icon the screening list in the root view (button "show details" clicked) and stores it into javaFX elements
      void downloadBookingData(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Purpose: Writing all the Screenings (future&past) available in a CSV text file Tutorials & resources: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/sql/ResultSet.html, https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/io/PrintWriter.html https://www.youtube.com/watch?
      void GetManager(java.lang.String user)
      Purpose: Displays the name of the Manager currently logged in.
      void initialize(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      Purpose: Initialises the content of pie chart, seating map and screening details if the view opens
      void loadPieChart()
      Purpose: Method pulls the pie chart data from the screening chosen from the screening list in the root view (button "show details" clicked)
      void loadScreeningDetails()
      Purpose: Method pulls the screening details from the screening chosen from the screening list in the root view (button "show details" clicked) and stores it into javaFX elements
      void loadSeatingMap()
      Purpose: Method recreates non-clickable seating map from the screening chosen from the screening list in the root view (button "show details" clicked) and stores it into javaFX elements.
      void SignOut(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Purpose: When button clicked, manager gets back to LoginView (Logout) clicked.
      void toDashboard(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Purpose: When button clicked, manager gets back to landing page (manager dashboard) clicked.
